name: Beginning Hour: WIP Demo
description:
Beginning Hour is a text-based horror adventure based on the RE7: Beginning Hour teaser. You wake up alone in a creepy house, and you need to find a way out.

This story has multiple endings which are designed to be discovered through repeated playthroughs. As this demo is a work in progress, not all paths are complete at this stage.

This story contains strong language, as well as descriptions of bloody violence, and dead bodies of people and animals.
